name: Words with Shapes
description:
Play Words with Shapes! Inspired by Tetris and Scrabble

This is very much in development, so please give us feedback, both on what you like and what you think would make the game a lot better. 

How to play

Form words with the letters in the falling blocks. Use the left and right arrow keys to move the falling block (you can move the block until it lands - and you can hear it hit).  Use down to have the block fall faster.  Use up to rotate the block.  WASD keys can also be used.

Play Mode

Endless Mode (or Normal Mode) will hide the play area when you pause. Zen Mode will let take as much time as you want to figure out where to place the piece and the pieces will only move down when you press down.  High Score is tracked separately for each mode.

Difficulty Settings

In the settings menu you can change the difficulty.

DifficultyWord Length Allowed Easy2+ Medium3+ Hard4+ Short Words Only5 or less (used for testing purposes) Power Up(s)

Dynamite - When you clear words the adjacent blocks also get cleared.  It becomes available after 10 blocks land and last for 4 blocks; use it wisely!
More to come....  Let us know if there is something you'd like to see.
